originalText.text: The ever effervescent Ben Model & Steve Massa give great background & fun Q&A’s for The Silent Clown’s Film Series. Ben’s piano playing during the films is a delight!!!

text.text: The ever effervescent Ben Model & Steve Massa give great background & fun Q&A’s for The Silent Clown’s Film Series. Ben’s piano playing during the films is a delight!!!

originalText.text:
A nice little theater to see an intimate performance.  They have an odd way of taking tickets and organizing the lines - sometimes you get in a long winding line going down the stairs, sometimes you have a ticket. It always seems slightly disorganized - but you get in.

The theater has no sight line problems  - so where ever you sit is fine.

Some really interesting programs are presented (albeit uneven in quality)- but well worth the gamble.

Clean, well lit.

originalText.text: Good size auditorium with excellent audio-visual facilities. Been here a couple of times to see free performances, panel discussions, and short films and I've never been disappointed. If you're looking for free worthwhile events  in the city, this place is worth checking out. Visit their website for their current programming.

originalText.text: Great programs and films, keep an eye out. A sounds system update would be great but the NYPL decided it needs to throw out books from the main reading room and clean up after it's Lions. Good way to spend $ nypl.
